text: Harry Depue Train II (born November 5, 1927) is a retired United States Navy admiral and a Senior Fellow at the Joint Advanced Warfighting School at the Joint Forces Staff College in Norfolk, Virginia.Old Dominion University Research Foundation . ==Awards and decorations== ==References== ==Other websites== * Profiles at SourceWatch Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:American military personnel of the Korean War Category:Military people from Washington, D.C.
title: Harry D. Train II
